data.title: How do I recharge my Namma Metro Smart Card?
data.text:
If you have already recharged your Smart Card with PhonePe, then you can recharge it again by following these steps:

Tap See All under Recharge & Pay Bills section on your PhonePe app home screen.

Tap Bangalore under Metro recharges and QR tickets.

Select the card you want to recharge under the Recharge Metro Card section.

Enter the amount (in multiples of ₹50) you want to recharge for.

Tap Proceed to Pay.

If you are a new user, and you wish to recharge your Smart Card for the first time with PhonePe:

Tap See All under Recharge & Pay Bills section on your PhonePe app home screen.

Tap Bangalore under Metro recharges and QR tickets.

Tap Recharge Metro Card.

Enter the Smart Card number and the Card Name.

Tap Save and Recharge.

Enter the amount (in multiples of ₹50) you want to recharge for.

Tap Proceed to Pay.

Important: We request you to wait for 60 minutes after completing the payment on PhonePe to place your Smart Card on the AFC gate of your nearest metro station to complete the recharge process. You can check your card balance by placing it on top of the card reader at the AFC gate or your PhonePe app under Bangalore (Namma Metro app).

Please place/validate your card on the reader of the AFC gate of your nearest Metro station within 7 days of recharging your Smart Card with PhonePe. In case of any delay, you can visit the customer care counter at any Bangalore Metro Station for a manual balance update within 60 days from the date of recharge. If you need further help, please reach out to BMRCL customer support on their toll free number 1800-425-12345.

Note: You can only recharge your Smart Card with multiples of ₹50.
